posts.post_title: WTTF or buy T206 Carolina Brights Eddie Collins
posts.post_content:
Posted By: B O'Brien
Anyone have a Carolina Brights Eddie Collins they are willing to let go, I have only been able to find one PSA 3 in the sales histories.  VG or VGEX is preferd.  I would like to trade from my Piedmont Factory 42's, or I can sell one and pay for it, whatever you prefer.  Please send scan to email below.
Let me know if any one has one they would be willing to let go.
Thanks as always,
Bob
upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com
